participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Curious and laid-back, enjoys nature and quiet moments.
participant_1.background: I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake. I am always looking for wildlife when I am outside. I like to drink chai tea before bed every night. I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise. My daily routine is pretty relaxed as I'm taking a year off before college, but I like to make sure I keep busy and get some reading in on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Hands-on and creative, enjoys building and spending time with family.
participant_2.background: I work on a project at my day job, then go home and build something with my hands. I celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog. My mom is my favorite person of all people. Black coffee is my addiction. I don't know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice.

content.text: Pretty good, just finished a project at work and I'm about to build something.
Oh that's cool, what are you building?
A birdhouse, I'm going to put it in my parents' backyard for them.
Aww, that's really sweet. I'm sure they'll love it.
Thanks, I hope so. How about you, what are you up to today?
Not much, just taking a break from studying. I'm taking a year off before college and I'm not really sure what I want to do yet.
Oh cool, I'm actually taking a year off before college too! I'm not sure what I want to do either, but I'm thinking about going into programming.
That's cool, I've always been interested in programming but I'm not sure if I'm good enough at it.
Well, you can always learn! I'm self-taught, and I'm doing pretty well so far.
That's awesome, maybe I'll give it a try. Thanks for the chat!
No problem, have a good night!
